member.name: DISK_DETECTION_INFO.SizeOfDetectInfo
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes.

summary.para: This member can be one of the following values from the DETECTION_TYPE enumeration.

| Value | Enumeration | Meaning | | --- | --- | --- | | DetectExInt13 | 2 | The disk has an extended Int13 partition. | | DetectInt13 | 1 | The disk has a standard Int13 partition. | | DetectNone | 0 | The disk does not have an Int13 or an extended Int13 partition. |

member.name: DISK_DETECTION_INFO.DUMMYUNIONNAME.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.Int13
member.summary: If DetectionType is DetectInt13, the union is a structure.

member.name: DISK_DETECTION_INFO.DUMMYUNIONNAME.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.ExInt13
member.summary: If DetectionType is DetectExInt13, the union is a structure.
